name: Sort It Out (MatchaMaze)
description:
Kingston University - Digital Studio Practice Module Project

Help us by answering a few quick questions about the project:
https://forms.gle/gXQgDfGeUfhDGiVv5

As a part of our University course, we needed to create a mobile application that is a game, but it has a serious aim. We decided on a game that focuses on recycling. 

What can the app do:
- You can play recycling games
- Read about local (Kingston, UK) organisations involved with recycling
- Use a scanner to identify which item should be sorted to which bin, or if the item is not in our database, you can help by adding new  or correcting misidentified products
(UK Recycling rules)

Contributors:

  • AJ Lee
  • Ruiqi Li
  • Siying Li
  • Weilun Li
  • Akos Nagy
  • Bhumika Pagaria
